title: Traditional Housing | Oberlin College and Conservatory
description: Located across campus, the halls range from smaller, more intimate environments that accommodate approximately 80 residents, to halls that house roughly 250 residents. Each hall includes students from multiple class years.
cleaned_text: If you want to try a more traditional college living experience, try looking at any of the college's eight traditional halls. Located across campus, the halls range from smaller, more intimate environments that accommodate approximately 80 residents, to halls that house roughly 250 residents. Each hall includes students from multiple class years.
